attributes.action: Change tiered restrictions in Kent to boroughs rather than the whole of Kent.
attributes.additional_details: Areas such as New Romney, Dymchurch, Folkestone etc. Have MUCH lower rates than hard hit areas like Medway and Swale yet are in the same tier. Be more fair to areas with lower rates like has been done in Liverpool and other areas In the north.
attributes.background: Look into changing Kent into boroughs rather than Kent as a whole

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562004
